channel.title: I added a chatbox to my forum, and it isn't working?
channel.description:
Hi,
I added this chatbox to my SMF forum version 1.14:
http://custom.simplemachines.org/mods/index.php?mod=585
My shoutbox just says " loading shoutbox... ", and gets stuck like that here is a picture:
[img]http://sphinx.ulmb.com/pictures/blablalol.bmp[/img]
Does anyone no how to fix it?
Thanks [center][img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/default/images/warnwarn.gif[/img] We are not a SMF support site.[/center]

item.title: I added a chatbox to my forum, and it isn't working?
item.dc:creator: @musicmad441 Musicmad
item.description:
@musicmad441 wrote:

XharveyX:

search in the files in the mods

Can you add my msn: musicmad441@hotmail.com

And give me a hand.

Thanks

Read full topic
item.source: I added a chatbox to my forum, and it isn't working?

item.title: I added a chatbox to my forum, and it isn't working?
item.dc:creator: @bowserjr2 Bowser jr
item.description:
@bowserjr2 wrote:

[quote=“bowserjr2, post:3, topic:189131”][quote=http://custom.simplemachines.org/mods/index.php?mod=585]
Fixing some kinds of “loading shoutbox…” errors: Some errors are caused by having the wrong domain; if you log on and go into a board, and the problem disappears, then the fix is to change

Code: var board_url = "', $boardurl, '";
to

Code: var board_url = "/path/to/forum";
in Themes//index.template.php where /path/to/forum is the absolute URL to your forum. For example, if your forum is at http://domain.com/myforum, use “/myforum” (NOT /home/domain/myforum!)[/qoute]

Where do I change that?[/quote]
Go the your forum map in FTP.
Then open Themes then the “Theme” and replace in index.template.php
var board_url = “’, $boardurl, '”;
to
var board_url = “/path/to/forum”;

Read full topic
item.source: I added a chatbox to my forum, and it isn't working?

item.title: I added a chatbox to my forum, and it isn't working?
item.dc:creator: @musicmad441 Musicmad
item.description:
@musicmad441 wrote:

[quote author=bowserjr2 link=topic=251982.msg2108493#msg2108493 date=1205531958]

[b]Fixing some kinds of "loading shoutbox..." errors:[/b] Some errors are caused by having the wrong domain; if you log on and go into a board, and the problem disappears, then the fix is to change [code]Code: var board_url = "', $boardurl, '";[/code] to [code]Code: var board_url = "/path/to/forum";[/code] in Themes//index.template.php where /path/to/forum is the *absolute* URL to your forum. For example, if your forum is at http://domain.com/myforum, use "/myforum" (NOT /home/domain/myforum!)[/qoute]

Where do I change that?

Read full topic
